factoryInfo.name: Code Coverage
factoryInfo.description: This analysis tracks which lines in the source code have been covered during execution. This analysis depends on file/line debug information being loaded.

factoryInfo.name: Code And Branch Coverage
factoryInfo.description: This analysis tracks which lines in the source code have been covered during execution. This analysis depends on file/line debug information being loaded.

factoryInfo.name: TLM Port Trace
factoryInfo.description: This is factory for ports trace monitor

attrInfo.name: Specify ranges
attrInfo.description: Specify a list of begin and end addresses for ranges of transactions to be traced. If no range is specified then all transactions will be traced.

attrInfo.name: Max data
attrInfo.description: This attribute controls the maximum number of words of data we will trace per transaction. The default value is -1 which means trace ALL words of data. For performance reasons you can set this value to 1 in this case we will only trace a single word of the data being sent in a transaction. Setting it to 0 means trace no data at all.(TLM2 based sockets)

attrInfo.name: Record byte enable
attrInfo.description: This attribute controls whether byte enables are traced. If the variable is set to 0, then byte enables are not traced. Doing this will improve performance of TLM2 tracing. (TLM2 based sockets)

factoryInfo.name: Transaction Field Statistics
factoryInfo.description: Record one field of scv transactions in coware database and calculate statistics based on specified interval

attrInfo.name: Analyzed Field
attrInfo.description: Select the field for processing

attrInfo.name: Condition Field
attrInfo.description: Select the field to be used as ID

attrInfo.name: Interval
attrInfo.description: Specify interval for statistics calculation

factoryInfo.name: Transaction Contention Statistics
factoryInfo.description: Record number of overlapping transactions to the database and calculate statistics based on specified interval

attrInfo.name: Generator
attrInfo.description: Specify the field to use as id

attrInfo.name: Interval
attrInfo.description: Specify interval for statistics calculation

factoryInfo.name: Transaction Contention Statistics Recursive
factoryInfo.description: Record number of overlapping transactions to the database and calculate statistics based on specified interval

attrInfo.name: Generator
attrInfo.description: Specify the field to use as id

attrInfo.name: Interval
attrInfo.description: Specify interval for statistics calculation

factoryInfo.name: Transaction Count
factoryInfo.description: Record number transactions in specified interval

attrInfo.name: Generator
attrInfo.description: Specify the field to use as id

attrInfo.name: Interval
attrInfo.description: Specify interval for statistics calculation

factoryInfo.name: Transaction Count Recursive
factoryInfo.description: Record number transactions in specified interval

attrInfo.description: Specify the field to use as id

attrInfo.name: Interval
attrInfo.description: Specify interval for statistics calculation

attrInfo.name: Constraint File
attrInfo.description: Specify the name of a file that contains constraint rules

attrInfo.name: Record target perspective
attrInfo.description: Record extra information so a target centric view can be shown

attrInfo.name: Record thread specific analysis
attrInfo.description: Record extra information so analysis results can be shown in a thread specific way

attrInfo.name: Record transaction attribute specific analysis
attrInfo.description: Record extra information so analysis results can be sliced by AXI Burst Size, AXI Transaction Length

attrInfo.name: Record end to end propagation delay
attrInfo.description: Record forward and backward delay beteween initiator and target

attrInfo.name: Include connected buses
attrInfo.description: Extend the bus to include buses connected to the target

attrInfo.name: Record metric distributions
attrInfo.description: Record distributions of the transaction/transfer metrics

attrInfo.name: Interval
attrInfo.description: Specify interval for statistics calculation

attrInfo.name: Constraint File
attrInfo.description: Specify the name of a file that contains constraint rules

attrInfo.name: Record target perspective
attrInfo.description: Record extra information so a target centric view can be shown

attrInfo.name: Record thread specific analysis
attrInfo.description: Record extra information so analysis results can be shown in a thread specific way

attrInfo.name: Record transaction attribute specific analysis

attrInfo.name: Record end to end propagation delay

attrInfo.name: Record metric distributions
attrInfo.description: Record distributions of the transaction/transfer metrics

attrInfo.name: KPI definitions
attrInfo.description: Contains a list of Key Performance Indicator (KPI) definitions that should be recorded. Each KPI definition must contain the following items that describe the KPI: kpiID, metric, port, channel, aggregation, unit. Example: {{kpi1 Latency A.B.C WrAddr Min ns} {kpi2 ...} ...}

attrInfo.name: Record global metrics
attrInfo.description: Controls whether common metrics like Latency and Utilization should be recorded for all ports in the design. This can be turned off when only KPI recording is relevant.

attrInfo.name: Record resource metrics
attrInfo.description: Enables the recording of metrics that are derived from resource IPTs in the design, such as contention or BufferUtilization

attrInfo.name: Label
attrInfo.description: Allows annotation of traces with a custom label. This is useful for export and scripting flows such as Analysis Post-Processing Scripting. In these cases, the assigned labels can for example be used to group multiple traces.

attrInfo.name: Label
attrInfo.description: Allows annotation of traces with a custom label. This is useful for export and scripting flows such as Analysis Post-Processing Scripting. In these cases, the assigned labels can for example be used to group multiple traces.

attrInfo.name: Interval
attrInfo.description: Specify interval for statistics calculation

attrInfo.name: Specify registers
attrInfo.description: Enter the names of the specific registers to be traced.

attrInfo.name: Specify ranges
attrInfo.description: Specify the begin and end offsets of a list of ranges of the memory to be traced. These values are offsets, not addresses, so for example, an offset of 1024 means address 4096 when the memory width is 4.

attrInfo.name: Specify registers
attrInfo.description: Select the names of the specific registers to be traced.

attrInfo.name: Specify ranges
attrInfo.description: Specify the begin and end offsets of a list of ranges of the memory to be traced. These values are offsets, not addresses, so for example, an offset of 1024 means address 4096 when the memory width is 4.

attrInfo.name: Specify registers
attrInfo.description: Select the names of the specific registers to be traced.

attrInfo.name: Sample Rate
attrInfo.description: The simulation time interval used to sample simulation metrics. Smaller values improve the resolution but increase the database size.

attrInfo.name: Intrusive Mode
attrInfo.description: If true, samples will be taken at equidistant intervals, which can change the scheduling order in the simulation. If false, samples will be taken during time advances close to the specified sample rate.

attrInfo.name: Dynamic Quantum Sampling
attrInfo.description: If true, dynamic quantum information will be sampled for all cores in the simulation. If false, no temporal decoupling information will be sampled, reducing database size and performance overhead.

attrInfo.name: SystemC Process Tracing
attrInfo.description: If true, time spent in all SystemC processes is traced in detail. If false, time measurements for cores (ISS) will remain accurate. Consider disabling this option if you want to reduce the profilers runtime overhead.

attrInfo.name: Maximum File Size [MB]
attrInfo.description: The maximum file size for the profile database in MB. If this value is set to 0, maximum profile database file size will not be limited.

attrInfo.name: TLM and Subroutine Tracing
attrInfo.description: If true, annotated subroutines (like TLM calls, register callbacks) will be traced in detail, to further break down the time spent in SystemC processes. If enabled, this option can add considerable profiler runtime overhead.

attrInfo.name: FastTrack Message Collection
attrInfo.description: If true, all enabled FastTrack messages will be collected and stored in form of profile annotations.

attrInfo.name: Heap Allocation Tracing
attrInfo.description: If true, information on the dynamic heap allocation at runtime will be added to the Simulation Profile.

attrInfo.name: Plugin Extensions
attrInfo.description: Libraries to be loaded as plugin extensions. Example: <lib1>;<lib2>

attrInfo.name: Config File
Output File (*.tdpdb)
attrInfo.description: Name of the file where the profiler samples are written to. The file extension will always be .tdpdb.

factoryInfo.name: Function Trace
factoryInfo.description: Record all function calls. This requires symbol information to be loaded in order to give meaningful results.

attrInfo.name: Context
attrInfo.description: Focus your analysis on a particular context (process, task, ...). E.g.: "/foo/993" focuses analysis on one particular instance of the "foo" context, whereas "/foo" focuses on all instances of this context. Leave empty to enable this analysis for all contexts.

attrInfo.name: Stack Reset Functions
attrInfo.description: Enter the names of the functions for which the function trace monitor will reset the stack(on calling this function)

attrInfo.name: Context
attrInfo.description: Focus your analysis on a particular context (process, task, ...). E.g.: "/foo/993" focuses analysis on one particular instance of the "foo" context, whereas "/foo" focuses on all instances of this context. Leave empty to enable this analysis for all contexts.

attrInfo.name: Aggregation interval
attrInfo.description: Defines the time period over which to aggregate the accesses. Smaller values give you higher definition, at the expense of increased memory consumption.

attrInfo.name: Instruction Level Functions
attrInfo.description: Enter the names of the functions for which profiling should happen on an instruction-level

attrInfo.name: Sample At Interval Boundaries
attrInfo.description: Sample the counters at interval boundaries, instead of basic block boundaries

attrInfo.name: Context
attrInfo.description: Focus your analysis on a particular context (process, task, ...). E.g.: "/foo/993" focuses analysis on one particular instance of the "foo" context, whereas "/foo" focuses on all instances of this context. Leave empty to enable this analysis for all contexts.

attrInfo.name: Aggregation interval
attrInfo.description: Defines the time period over which to aggregate the accesses. Smaller values give you higher definition, at the expense of increased memory consumption.

attrInfo.name: Record memory access trace
attrInfo.description: Record memory access trace

factoryInfo.name: Terminal Trace
factoryInfo.description: Traces all text messages which become available on the terminal. This is typically used to visualize the messages being printed by the kernel logger.

factoryInfo.name: Instruction Trace
factoryInfo.description: Trace all instructions executed by the core.

attrInfo.name: Context
attrInfo.description: Focus your analysis on a particular context (process, task, ...). E.g.: "/foo/993" focuses analysis on one particular instance of the "foo" context, whereas "/foo" focuses on all instances of this context. Leave empty to enable this analysis for all contexts.

attrInfo.name: Record time of individual instructions
attrInfo.description:
By default, the time when each basic block starts executing is recorded as well as the total duration of the basic block. This is usually sufficient for understanding the execution of your software and debugging problems.
By choosing 'Yes', the exact time at which each individual instruction gets executed is recorded. This gives you higher precision, at the expense of slower simulation speed. This attribute cannot be changed at runtime.

attrInfo.name: Context
attrInfo.description: Focus your analysis on a particular context (process, task, ...). E.g.: "/foo/993" focuses analysis on one particular instance of the "foo" context, whereas "/foo" focuses on all instances of this context. Leave empty to enable this analysis for all contexts.

attrInfo.name: Aggregation interval
attrInfo.description: Defines the time period over which to aggregate the accesses. Smaller values give you higher definition, at the expense of increased memory consumption.

attrInfo.name: Record Trace
attrInfo.description: Enable or disable collection of trace data

attrInfo.name: Record Stats
attrInfo.description: Enable or disable collection of statistics data

attrInfo.name: Aggregation interval
attrInfo.description: Defines the time period over which to aggregate the accesses. Smaller values give you higher definition, at the expense of increased memory consumption.

attrInfo.name: Record Trace
attrInfo.description: Enable or disable collection of trace data

attrInfo.name: Record Stats
attrInfo.description: Enable or disable collection of statistics data

attrInfo.description: Defines the time period over which to aggregate the accesses. Smaller values give you higher definition, at the expense of increased memory consumption.

attrInfo.name: Record Trace
attrInfo.description: Enable or disable collection of trace data

attrInfo.description: Enable or disable collection of statistics data

attrInfo.name: Aggregation interval
attrInfo.description: Defines the time period over which to aggregate the accesses. Smaller values give you higher definition, at the expense of increased memory consumption.

attrInfo.name: Record Trace
attrInfo.description: Enable or disable collection of trace data

attrInfo.name: Record Stats
attrInfo.description: Enable or disable collection of statistics data

attrInfo.name: Context
attrInfo.description: Focus your analysis on a particular context (process, task, ...). E.g.: "/foo/993" focuses analysis on one particular instance of the "foo" context, whereas "/foo" focuses on all instances of this context. Leave empty to enable this analysis for all contexts.

attrInfo.name: Variables to Trace
attrInfo.description: Specify what to trace: variables, symbols, addresses, etc.

attrInfo.name: Group
attrInfo.description: Specify the group this monitor belongs to, all variable trace monitors in the same group will record the data in a shared result

attrInfo.name: Trace Reads
attrInfo.description: Trace read accesses, writes are always traced

attrInfo.name: Report back in time event
attrInfo.description: Trace back in time events. This is when a variable is read/written at an earlier time compared to the previous access, this can happen due to the cores running in separate quantums. This might indicate a possible race condition in the embedded software

attrInfo.name: Aggregation interval
attrInfo.description: Defines the time period over which to aggregate the accesses. Smaller values give you higher definition, at the expense of increased memory consumption.

attrInfo.name: Record Trace
attrInfo.description: Enable or disable collection of trace data

attrInfo.name: Record Stats
attrInfo.description: Enable or disable collection of statistics data

attrInfo.name: Check symbol filename
attrInfo.description: Only enable tracing of a variable if the filename for the symbol is part of the active symbol table set

attrInfo.name: Label
attrInfo.description: Allows annotation of traces with a custom label. This is useful for export and scripting flows such as Analysis Post-Processing Scripting. In these cases, the assigned labels can for example be used to group multiple traces.

attrInfo.name: Merge split accesses
attrInfo.description: When this attribute is enabled, all split variable accesses will be merged. A split access is defined as multiple consecutive and contigious accesses to the same variable.Such a split access may either be triggered by the hardware, for example due to unaligned memory access, or by software, for example due to access through pointers.

factoryInfo.name: Status Trace
factoryInfo.description: Traces the statuses of a status object

factoryInfo.name: Status Trace Recursive
factoryInfo.description: Traces the statuses of a status object

factoryInfo.name: Logging
factoryInfo.description: Traces logging messages from an object

attrInfo.description: Record logging messages to analysis database.

attrInfo.description: Send info messages to stdout

attrInfo.description: Send warning messages to stdout

attrInfo.name: Send to stdout
attrInfo.description: Send error messages to stdout

attrInfo.name: Log level (0->6)
attrInfo.description: Sets the desired model internal logging level (6 being most verbose)

attrInfo.name: Record to database
attrInfo.description: Record data to database

attrInfo.name: Send to stdout
attrInfo.description: Send model internal messages to stdout
